SELECT
RFID_MACHINE_UUID as rfidMachineUuid, MACHINE_TYPE_UUID as machineTypeUuid, MACHINE_ID as machineId, MACHINE_NAME as machineName, MAC_ADDR as macAddr, IP as ip, SUBNETMASK as subnetmask, GATEWAY as gateway, INSERT_DATE as insertDate, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, as insertUuid, as updateUuid FROM ST_RFID_MACHINE
1=1
AND MACHINE_TYPE_UUID = #{machineTypeUuid}
AND MACHINE_ID LIKE '%' || #{machineId} || '%'
AND MACHINE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{machineName} || '%'
AND IP LIKE '%' || #{ip} || '%'
